{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Compex |model=WPJ419 |revision=(DK04) |series=AC1300 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=now |type=wireless embedded board |pwr_v=12-24 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ4019 |cpu1_cspeed=716 |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=32 |ram1=256 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, USB 3.0, |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 6-pin header,, J3 |serial=yes,, 20-pin header,, J4 |wi1_module=Compex WSB419 |wi1_module_if=SD (module) |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip1_model=IPQ4019 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module=Compex WSB419 |wi2_module_if=SD (module) |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi2_chip1_model=IPQ4019 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8075 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=2 |flags=MU-MIMO, DFS, MicroSD Card slot, SIM Card slot, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac }} {{TagLine|2.4/5GHz 2x2 Wireless Embedded Board}} :[https://www.compex.com.sg/product/wpj419/ Product page] (QCA Reference DK04) ''Get the latest Updates from Compex Systems - [http://eepurl.com/bXB9j5 Link]'' "C-BT-419EPW 7A01" is silkscreened on the main board. ===Product Key Features=== * Chipset: [[Qualcomm]] IPQ4019 (DK04: Dakota/Wasabi) * 2×2 On-board 2.4GHz radio (400Mbps physical data rate) * 2×2 On-board 5GHz radio (867Mbps physical data rate) * 2x U.FL connectors, diplexer allows dual band concurrent * 2x GbE Port, Dual Band (2.4/5GHz), 802.11ac Wave 2 * Supports Mini PCIe slot, Wi-Fi/LTE module, USB 3.0 Port * Supports MU-MIMO, 802.11n WLAN applications (2.4/5GHz) * Supports 20/40MHz at 2.4GHz and 20/40/80MHz at 5GHz * Frequency Range: 2.412~2.472 GHz, 5.180~5.825 GHz ===Specifications=== *Reference Design: DK04 *Product Type: Embedded Board *Chipset: [[Qualcomm]] IPQ4019 WiSoC *System Memory: 256MB (supports up to 1GB) *Flash Memory: 32MB (NOR) *Interface: 2x GbE LAN (RJ45) ports with Auto MDI-X :1x Mini PCIe v2.0 slot (9.2mm height), uses USB 2.0 signals :1x Serial Port 4-Pin connector (UART) :1x Serial Port 6-Pin connector (High Speed UART) :1x JTAG 20-Pin connector, 1x USB 3.0 Port *LED Indicators: 1x Power, 2x LAN activity :Reset Button: 1x F/W Reset Button *Operating System: QCA Reference Firmware, OpenWrt v18.x *Dimension: 120 x 105 x 15 mm ===Purchase Sample=== [http://shop.compex.com.sg/ Compex System Sample Store] ====Ordering Configuration==== 
Item Code		    Chipset	            Card Information
WPJ419 7A01	    IPQ4019 2x2 2.4/5GHz            Embedded Board
===See also=== :[[Compex]] • [https://www.compex.com.sg/embedded-board/ Embedded Boards] *[[Compex WSB419]] (DK04: Wasabi) *[[Compex WPJ419]] (DK04: Wasabi) *[[Compex WPJ428]] (DK03: Dakota) *[[Compex AP-DK01]] (DK01: Malibu) *[[Compex AP-DK03]] (DK03: Dakota) *[[Compex WPQ864]] *[[Compex WPQ865]] ==Images== File:Compex WPJ419.jpg|WPJ419 [[Has images::internal| ]] __NOTOC__
